title: Single slit - width of central max for 500 nm beam

content.question: A beam of light from a laser with wavelength <math alttext="500 newton meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>500</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>nm</mtext></math> is incident on a narrow slit of width <math alttext="5000 newton meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5000</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>nm</mtext></math>. A diffraction pattern is formed on a screen <math alttext="2.0 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math> away from the opening. What is the width of the central bright fringe in the diffraction pattern?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
